activities: Trade-PMR, Inc. is an introducing broker dealer regulated by FINRA and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. We collect client personal information for opening and operating brokerage accounts. We additionally collect information on advisors and potential advisors in connection with the management, operation, business relationships and activities of Trade-PMR, Inc.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Ireland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Employee, client and customer data, including manually processed data is covered.
recoursemech:
Trade-PMR, Inc. compliance department will investigate all complaints in an effort to resolve any issue brought to our attention. 
The Firm will be using JAMS to resolve any international complaint issues.
